feed.title: Paperless-AI Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Paperless-AI: v2.5.2
entry.content:
Changes:

Added webhook functionaltity : https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/discussions/223

Redesign of the Setup Page, now with Intro and Tutorial. Also added error handling for permission issues with the api key.

Feature to completly disable the automatic scanning.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/clusterzx/paperless-ai/compare/v2.5.0...v2.5.2
